meanings: be as if poured all over with ink

vlive.korean: [비치된 실내화로 갈아 신고 출발!] [After putting on slippers] [Let's go!] View video NCT LIFE / 심포유 - my SMTelevision : [NCT LIFE] Ep.03 Last mission’s result revealed!
근데 이거 진짜 딸기를 갈아 넣었네? They really put strawberries in here huh? 듣기 View video SF9 : 빈,us🍀
vlive.english: They really put strawberries in here huh?

vlive.korean: 몇 개월 만에 갈아입힌 거야? How many months has it been since I changed clothes for him? 듣기 View video ONG SEONG WU : 안자는 위로 손 머리 위로
vlive.english: How many months has it been since I changed clothes for him?

vlive.korean: 이거 필름은 다시 갈아끼워야겠다 그리고 또? I should get a new protection film. And what else? 듣기 View video NU'EST : [NU’EST] 러브야🐯
vlive.english: I should get a new protection film. And what else?

vlive.korean: 아리소녀 님께서 '갈아 입을 옷은 가져 갔나요?' "Fan ID" said, "Did you take clothes to change into?" 듣기 View video Hwang Chi Yeul : 제주에요^^
vlive.english: "Fan ID" said, "Did you take clothes to change into?"
